meanings.definition: A place where aircraft, especially jet aircraft, take off and land.
meanings.sent1: The busy jetports bustled with planes coming and going.
meanings.sent2: We arrived at the jetports just in time to catch our flight.
meanings.sent3: The jetports looked like a giant playground for airplanes.
meanings.sent4: The jetports were like bustling cities in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the jetports twinkled like stars on the ground.

meanings.definition: The act of traveling by jet aircraft.
meanings.sent1: Flying through the clouds, I experienced the thrill of jetports.
meanings.sent2: Her dream of exploring the world came true through jetports.
meanings.sent3: I never knew jetports could make me feel like a bird in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The speed of jetports felt like time itself was racing by.
meanings.sent5: Jetports whisked me away to far-off lands in mere hours.
